name: Ritual (BugFix)
description:
This was my Driftwood Gaming Annual 2021 GameJam entry. After locating a few bugs, I have now tried to fix them to the best of my skills. I hope people enjoy this short free game. It's designed to be hard, so it’s made like a challenge. Maybe you don’t get it the first time. But you can always try again later. Or right now if you will. If you are out of money and/or bored this game is a great way to spend a 30 - 60min. Changes:

  • Added a "wait" timer in the TimerSystem to fix the FPS problem.
  • Additional rewriting, and fixing of grama and spelling errors.
  • The misstaken bug that made standard attack and block cost mana is removed.
  • Block now gives greater TP, MP and HP when it is used, making up for the loss of party members. 
  • Additional intro cutscene dialog has been re-added to give the game a little more story context.

Disclaimer;
This game is still made to be a hard challenge. So I hope it lives up to that, without disappointment.
